data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon now affecting the coast of Guangdong will moderate gradually. It will be warm during the day over the region in the next couple of days. A relatively humid easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of southern China early to midweek next week. It will be cloudier with light rain over the region. A trough of low pressure will affect southern China in the latter part of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260220","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods.
